zshrc

~/.zshrc

# --------------------------------------------------------------------
# åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
# --------------------------------------------------------------------

export LANG=ja_JP.UTF-8

export EDITOR=vim
export PAGER=lv

# Python venv
if [ -e venv/bin/activate ]; then
    # å­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ
    source venv/bin/activate
fi


# --------------------------------------------------------------------
# alias
# --------------------------------------------------------------------
alias brew='PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin brew' 
alias ls='ls -G'

alias brew='PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:/usr/local/sbin brew'
alias sed='gsed'

alias clean='rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData'

alias diff='colordiff'

alias vi=vim


# --------------------------------------------------------------------
# ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
# --------------------------------------------------------------------

# path
export PATH=/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:$PATH

# starship
eval "$(starship init zsh)"


# android
export ANDROID_NDK_ROOT=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk/ndk/24.0.8215888
export ANDROID_NDK_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk/ndk/24.0.8215888
export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk
export PATH=$ANDROID_HOME/bin:$PATH:${HOME}/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools:$HOME/Library/Android/sdk/tools/bin


# plantuml
export PLANTUML_LIMIT_SIZE=32768

# nodebrew
export PATH=$HOME/.nodebrew/current/bin:$PATH

# homebrew
export PATH="/usr/local/sbin:$PATH"

# zshé–¢é€£
source /usr/local/share/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh
source /usr/local/share/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh

if type brew &>/dev/null; then
    FPATH=/usr/local/share/zsh-completions:/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions:/usr/share/zsh/site-functions:/usr/share/zsh/5.8.1/functions

    autoload -Uz compinit
    compinit
fi

starshipã®è¨­å®š

mkdir -p ~/.config && touch ~/.config/starship.toml

[directory]
#ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªè¡¨ç¤º
truncation_length = 100
truncate_to_repo = false

[memory_usage]
disabled = false
threshold = -1
symbol = " "
style = "bold dimmed blue"
format = "$symbol[${ram}( | ${swap})]($style) "


[battery]
full_symbol = "ğŸ”‹"
charging_symbol = "ğŸ”Œ"
discharging_symbol = "âš¡"

[[battery.display]]
#ãƒãƒƒãƒ†ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ã€è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹éš›ã®æ–‡å­—ã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«
threshold = 100
style = "bold blue"

[time]
#æ™‚é–“ã®è¡¨ç¤ºã‚’ã‚ªãƒ³ã«ã—ã¦12æ™‚é–“è¡¨ç¤ºã«
use_12hr = false
time_format = "%T"
format = "ğŸ•™ $time($style) "
style = "bright-white"
disabled = false


[package]
disabled = true

[cmd_duration]
min_time = 10_000  # Show command duration over 10,000 milliseconds (=10 sec)
format = " took [$duration]($style)"

[character]
success_symbol = "[âœ](bold green) "
error_symbol = "[âœ—](bold red) "

[git_branch]
format = " [$symbol$branch]($style) "
symbol = "ğŸ£ "
style = "bold yellow"

[git_commit]
commit_hash_length = 8
style = "bold white"

[git_state]
format = '[\($state( $progress_current of $progress_total)\)]($style) '

[git_status]
conflicted = "âš”ï¸ "
ahead = "ğŸï¸ ğŸ’¨ Ã—${count}"
behind = "ğŸ¢ Ã—${count}"
diverged = "ğŸ”± ğŸï¸ ğŸ’¨ Ã—${ahead_count} ğŸ¢ Ã—${behind_count}"
untracked = "ğŸ›¤ï¸  Ã—${count}"
stashed = "ğŸ“¦ "
modified = "ğŸ“ Ã—${count}"
staged = "ğŸ—ƒï¸  Ã—${count}"
renamed = "ğŸ“› Ã—${count}"
deleted = "ğŸ—‘ï¸  Ã—${count}"
style = "bright-white"
format = "$all_status$ahead_behind"

[python]
format = "[$symbol$version]($style) "
style = "bold green"

[rust]
format = "[$symbol$version]($style) "
style = "bold green"

[username]
style_user = "bold dimmed blue"
show_always = false

item.content:encoded:
GORMã§timeå‹ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã®æ³¨æ„

GORMã§æ§‹é€ ä½“ã‚’ãƒã‚¤ã‚°ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã—ãŸã¨ãã« ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¦ã‚‚timeå‹ã«ã¯ãªã‚‰ãªã‹ã£ãŸã€ã€ã€

type test struct {
BreakTime                  *time.Time               `gorm:"type:time;comment:ä¼‘æ†©æ™‚é–“"`
}

â†“ ãƒã‚¤ã‚°ãƒ¬ã™ã‚‹ã¨

create table test
(
    break_time                   timestamp with time zone,
);

ã¨ãªã£ãŸã€

ã©ã†ã‚‚ã€ã€Œtimeã€ã®ã‚ã¨ã«ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã‚Œã°è§£æ±ºã™ã‚‹ã¿ãŸã„ã€‚

type test struct {
BreakTime                  *time.Time               `gorm:"type:time ;comment:ä¼‘æ†©æ™‚é–“"`
}

æ™‚é–“ãŒã‹ã‹ã£ãŸã‘ã©ã“ã‚“ãªäº‹ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã ã¨ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

item.title: æ™‚é–“ã®å–ã‚Šæ‰±ã„æ–¹
item.description: timeå‹ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ time.Timeå‹ã®å¤‰æ•°ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ ç¾åœ¨æ™‚åˆ»ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ fmt.Println(time.Now()) // Output: // 2009-11-10 23:00:00 +0000 UTC æ—¥ä»˜ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ fmt.Println(time.Date(2014, time.December, 31, 12, 13, 24, 0, time.UTC)) // Output: // 2014-12-31 12:13:24
item.content:encoded:
timeå‹ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹

time.Timeå‹ã®å¤‰æ•°ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

ç¾åœ¨æ™‚åˆ»ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹

fmt.Println(time.Now())
// Output: 
// 2009-11-10 23:00:00 +0000 UTC

æ—¥ä»˜ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹

fmt.Println(time.Date(2014, time.December, 31, 12, 13, 24, 0, time.UTC))
// Output:
// 2014-12-31 12:13:24 +0000 UTC

loc, _ := time.LoadLocation("Asia/Tokyo")
fmt.Println(time.Date(2014, 12, 31, 8, 4, 18, 0, loc))
// Output:
// 2014-12-31 08:04:18 +0900 JST

æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹

t, _ := time.Parse("2006-01-02", "2014-12-31")
fmt.Println(t)
// Output:
// 2014-12-31 00:00:00 +0000 UTC

t, _ := time.Parse("2006-01-02 15:04:05 MST", "2014-12-31 12:31:24 JST")
fmt.Println(t)
// Output:
// 2014-12-31 12:31:24 +0900 JST

Unix TimeStampã‹ã‚‰å¤‰æ›

fmt.Println(time.Unix(1419933529, 0))
// Output:
// 2014-12-30 09:58:49 +0000 UTC

ç¬¬2å¼•æ•°ã§ãƒŠãƒç§’ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

æ™‚åˆ»ã®ç·¨é›†

æ™‚åˆ»ã®æ“ä½œã‚„å·®åˆ†ã‚’ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã€Durationå‹ã‚’å–ã‚Šæ‰±ã†ã“ã¨ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚ä¸­èº«ã¯int64ã€‚

type Duration int64

æ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«Durationå‹ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã€æ™‚åˆ»æ“ä½œã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã‚„ã™ãã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

fmt.Println(reflect.TypeOf(1))               // int
fmt.Println(reflect.TypeOf(1 * time.Second)) // time.Duration
fmt.Println(reflect.TypeOf(1 * time.Hour))   // time.Duration

â—‹â—‹å¾Œã®æ™‚åˆ»ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹

fmt.Println(t) // 2014-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t2 := t.Add(1 * time.Minute) // 1åˆ†å¾Œ
fmt.Println(t2)              // 2014-12-20 00:01:00 +0900 JST

t3 := t.Add(1 * time.Hour) // 1æ™‚é–“å¾Œ
fmt.Println(t3)            // 2014-12-20 01:00:00 +0900 JST

t4 := t.Add(24 * time.Hour) // 1æ—¥å¾Œ (time.Dayã¯æ¨™æº–ã«ã¯ç„¡ã„)
fmt.Println(t4)             // 2014-12-21 00:00:00 +0900 JST

1æ—¥å¾Œã®å ´åˆã¯time.AddDate()

fmt.Println(t) // 2014-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t2 := t.AddDate(0, 0, 1) // 1æ—¥å¾Œ
fmt.Println(t2)          // 2014-12-21 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t3 := t.AddDate(0, 1, 0) // 1ãƒ¶æœˆå¾Œ
fmt.Println(t3)          // 2015-01-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t4 := t.AddDate(1, 0, 0) // 1å¹´å¾Œ
fmt.Println(t4)          // 2015-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

â—‹â—‹å‰ã®æ™‚åˆ»ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹

time.Add()ã«-ã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹

fmt.Println(t) // 2014-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t2 := t.Add(-time.Minute) // 1åˆ†å‰
fmt.Println(t2)           // 2014-12-19 23:59:00 +0900 JST

t3 := t.Add(-time.Hour) // 1æ™‚é–“å‰
fmt.Println(t3)         // 2014-12-19 23:00:00 +0900 JST

t4 := t.Add(-24 * time.Hour) // 1æ—¥å‰
fmt.Println(t4)              // 2014-12-19 00:00:00 +0900 JST

time.AddDate()ã§ãƒã‚¤ãƒŠã‚¹ã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã‚Œã°éå»ã«ãªã‚‹

fmt.Println(t) // 2014-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t2 := t.AddDate(0, 0, -1) // 1æ—¥å‰
fmt.Println(t2)           // 2014-12-19 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t3 := t.AddDate(0, -1, 0) // 1ãƒ¶æœˆå‰
fmt.Println(t3)           // 2014-11-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

t4 := t.AddDate(-1, 0, 0) // 1å¹´å‰
fmt.Println(t4)           // 2013-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

2ã¤ã®æ™‚åˆ»ã‚’æ¯”è¼ƒã™ã‚‹

t1 := time.Date(2014, 12, 20, 12, 0, 0, 0, loc)
fmt.Println(t1) // 2014-12-20 12:00:00 +0900 JST

t2 := time.Date(2014, 12, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, loc)
fmt.Println(t2) // 2014-12-20 00:00:00 +0900 JST

fmt.Println(t1.Sub(t2)) // 12h0m0s

ç¾åœ¨æ™‚åˆ»ã‹ã‚‰ã©ã‚Œã ã‘å‰ã‹èª¿ã¹ã‚‹

loc, _ := time.LoadLocation("Asia/Tokyo")

t1 := time.Date(2009, 11, 8, 8, 0, 0, 0, loc)
d := time.Since(t1)
fmt.Println(d) // 72h0m0s (Go Playgroundã§å®Ÿè¡Œã—ãŸå ´åˆ)

time.Since(t)ã¯time.Now().Sub(t)ã®çœç•¥å½¢ã€‚

item.title: UIButtonã®æ–‡å­—ã®è¨­å®š
item.description: UIButtonã®æ–‡å­—ã®è¨­å®š ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®è¨­å®š UIButton ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸Šã§ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹æ™‚ã«ã€å„çŠ¶æ…‹ã«ãªã£ãŸå ´åˆã®ãƒœã‚¿
item.content:encoded:
UIButtonã®æ–‡å­—ã®è¨­å®š

ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®è¨­å®š

UIButton ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸Šã§ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹æ™‚ã«ã€å„çŠ¶æ…‹ã«ãªã£ãŸå ´åˆã®ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã€è‰²ãªã©ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

//ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®å®£è¨€
UIButton *button = [[UIButton alloc]init];

//ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ãƒ»ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆè‰²ãƒ»ç”»åƒã€€é€šå¸¸
[button setTitle:@"ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³" forState:UIControlStateNormal];
[button setTitleColor:[UIColor blackColor] forState:UIControlStateNormal];
[button setImage:[UIImage imageNamed:@"image"] forState:UIControlStateNormal];

//ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ãƒ»ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆè‰²ãƒ»ç”»åƒã€€æŠ¼ä¸‹ä¸­
[button setTitle:@"æŠ¼ä¸‹ä¸­" forState:UIControlStateHighlighted];
[button setTitleColor:[UIColor blackColor] forState:UIControlStateHighlighted];
[button setImage:[UIImage imageNamed:@"image"] forState:UIControlStateHighlighted];

//ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ãƒ»ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆè‰²ãƒ»ç”»åƒã€€é¸æŠä¸­
[button setTitle:@"é¸æŠä¸­" forState:UIControlStateSelected];
[button setTitleColor:[UIColor blackColor] forState:UIControlStateSelected];
[button setImage:[UIImage imageNamed:@"image"] forState:UIControlStateSelected];

item.title: HUGOä¾¿åˆ©ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆ
item.content:encoded:
HUGOã®ä½¿ã„æ–¹ãŒã‚ˆã†ã‚„ãã‚ã‹ã£ã¦ãã¦ã€ä»Šå¿…æ­»ã§ã™w

ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹æ™‚

hugo new post/ãªã‚“ãŸã‚‰ãƒ¼.md

ã£ã¦ã€æ›¸ã‹ãªãã‚ƒãªã‚‰ãªãã€ä¸­èº«ã‚‚ã¡ã‚‡ã³ã¡ã‚‡ã³æ›¸ãç›´ã•ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚‰ãªã„ã€‚ ã“ã‚Œã£ã¦é¢å€’ã§ã™ã­ã€‚

ã£ã§ã€ä¸‹ã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®æ–¹ãŒã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ä¾¿åˆ©ä¾¿åˆ©â™ª

https://techblog.sgr-ksmt.dev/2016/02/05/hugo_new_post/

  • æ¯å›post/ã¨ä»˜ã‘ã‚‹ã®ã‚’çœããŸã„

  • markdownãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã®å‰ã«æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ãŸã„

ãƒ›ãƒ³ãƒˆåŠ©ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ãŸã ã€è¨˜äº‹ãŒå¤ã„ã®ã‹ã€Œè¨­å®šã€ãªã©ãŒã€Œ=ã€ã§æ›¸ã‹ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¦ã†ã¾ãå‹•ã‹ãªã‹ã£ãŸã®ã§ã€ ç›´ã—ã¦ä½¿ã£ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚

#!/bin/bash
set -u

usage() {
  echo "Usage : $0 [-w] [title_name]" 1>&2
}

main () {
  cd $(cd $(dirname $0) && pwd)
  OPEN_EDITOR=0
  for ARG; do
    case "$ARG" in
      -*)
      while getopts w OPT "$ARG"; do
        case "$OPT" in
          w) OPEN_EDITOR=1;;
          *) usage; exit 1;;
        esac
      done
      ;;
    esac
  done

  shift $(expr $OPTIND - 1)
  [ $# -ne 1 ] && usage && exit 1

  slug="$1"
  file_name="posts/$(date +"%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S")-${slug}.md"
  file_path="content/$file_name"
  if [ ! -e "$file_path" ]; then
    hugo new "$file_name"
    sed -i '' "s/title: \".*\"/title: \"$slug\"/g" "$file_path"
    sed -i '' "s/slug: \".*\"/slug: \"$slug\"/g" "$file_path"
  else
    echo "$file_name already exists."
  fi

  [ $OPEN_EDITOR -eq 1 ] && atom "$file_path"

}
main "$@"
